original_text: Then King Asa brought all the men of Judah, and they carried away from Ramah the stones and timber Baasha had been using. With them he built up Geba and Mizpah.
korean_text: 아사 왕이 온 유다 무리를 거느리고 바아사가 라마를 건축하던 돌과 재목을 운반하여다가 게바와 미스바를 건축하였더라

sentences.original_text: Then King Asa brought all the men of Judah
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 아사 왕은 유다의 모든 사람들을 데려왔고

sentences.original_text: and they carried away from Ramah the stones and timber
With them he built up Geba and Mizpah
